io.spine.client

Class EntityQueryToProto

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.client.EntityQueryToProto
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Function<io.spine.query.EntityQuery<?,?,?>,io.spine.client.Query>

    public final class EntityQueryToProto
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.function.Function<io.spine.query.EntityQuery<?,?,?>,io.spine.client.Query>
    Transforms EntityQuery instances to the Protobuf-based Query objects.

    Such a transformation is required in order to transfer the EntityQuery instances over the wire.

    See Also:
    EntityQueryBuilder.build(Function)

    • Method Detail

      • transformWith

        public static EntityQueryToProto transformWith(ClientRequest request)
        Creates an instance of a transformer in a context of the passed ClientRequest.

        The instances of Query created by the transformer will rely on the properties of the client associated with the request.

        Parameters:
        request - the request in scope of which the conversion is done
        Returns:
        new instance of the query transformer
